bootstrap is same for every device
it is a combination of HTML, CSS, JScript
bootstrap is a framework for all devices
it's code works same on every device
for eg 
for browsers on different device it is very helpful
bootstrap was first made for mobiles
it is platform independent
there are 7 types of button in bootstrap
this is how we include different buttons in our HTML
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">primary</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info">info</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning">warning</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">danger</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-link">link</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-success">success</button><br>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">default</button><br>

this is grouping of button
<div class="btn-group">                                                                 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active">primary</button>                  
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info disabled">info</button>                      
<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning btn-lg">warning</button>              
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger btn-md">danger</button>                 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-link btn-sm">link</button>                      
<button type="button" class="btn btn-success btn-xs">success</button>                
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">default</button>
</div>

grouping of button vertically
<div class="btn-group-vertical">                                                           
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active">primary</button>                  
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info disabled">info</button>                      
<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning btn-lg">warning</button>              
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger btn-md">danger</button>                 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-link btn-sm">link</button>                      
<button type="button" class="btn btn-success btn-xs">success</button>                
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">default</button>
</div>

<div class="container">
username <input type="text" class="form-control">                                          <!-- form-control class changes the input block -->
password <input type="password" class="form-control"><br>
<input type="submit" value="login" class="btn btn-warning">
<input type="submit" value="clear" class="btn btn-warning">
</div><br>
Address <textarea rows="2" class="form-control"></textarea>
<select class="form-control">
<option>java</option>
<option>php</option>
<option>css</option>
</select>

</div>
<div class="container-fluid bg-warning text-center">                                         <!-- this is a full length container -->

to create row and columns in container 
<div class="container">                                     // container
<div class="row">                                           // 1st row
<div class="col">                                           // 1st column
</div>
<div class="col">                                           // 2nd column
</div>
<div class="col">                                           // 3rd column
</div>
</div>
</div>

to give the colors of the text
there is a class in bootstrap called text
<p class="text-warning">-----</p>                                // these classes gives different colors to thr text
<p class="text-muted">-----</p>
<p class="text-primary">-----</p>
<p class="text-success">-----</p>
<p class="text-info">-----</p>                                   // these text colors can be used in place of background color
<p class="text-danger">-----</p>                                
<p class="text-secondary">-----</p>
<p class="text-dark">-----</p>
<p class="text-body">-----</p>
<p class="text-light">-----</p>
<p class="text-white">-----</p>

heading, mark, kbd in bootstrap
<p class="display-1">display 1</p>                       // size of p changes with the number of display
<p class="display-2">display 2</p>
<p class="display-3">display 3</p>
<p class="display-4">display 4</p>

this is <mark>mark</mark> tag<br> 

press <kbd>ctrl + p</kbd>to print

WORKING WITH IMAGES IN BOOTSTRAP
there are many types of classes present in the bootstrap by which we can change the style of the images 
    rounded
	rounded-circle
    img-thumbnail
	float-right
	float-left
	float-center
	
JUMBOTRON AND JUMBOTRON-FLUID IN BOOTSTRAP
jumbotron is used to highlight some content
if we have some content in our webpage which we want to highlight then we use jumbotron 

width of jumbotron is fixed
while the width of jumbotron-fluid is flexible
<div class="jumbotron jumbotron-fluid">
bijender singh rawat
</div>
<div class="jumbotron">
bijender singh rawat
</div>

tables in bootstrap
<table class="table table-bordered table-hover table-striped">  // border of the table is visible 
                                                                // on hovering the row color will change 
                                                                // by table-striped alternative rows will be datrk and light  
<thead>
<tr>                                                            // row
<td></td>                                                       // column
</tr>
</thead>
</table>

badges in bootstrap 
the highlights in webpages are known as badges

<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-primary">new</span></p>                               
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-secondary">new</span></p>
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-rounded">new</span></p>
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-pill badge-primary">new</span></p>              // badge-pill is used for round badges
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-info">new</span></p>
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-warning">new</span></p>
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-success">new</span></p>
<p>this is an example of badge <span class="badge badge-dark">new</span></p>

alert boxes in bootstrap
<div class="container">
<div class="alert alert-warning alert-dismissible">                                                 // by the use of alert-dismissible alert box can be closed 
WARNING! WARNING! WARNING!
<button type="button" class="close" data-close="alert">&times;</button>                             // by data-close this alert box can be closed
</div>
</div>

progress bar in bootstrap
<div class="container">
<div class="progress">
<div class="progress-bar" style="width:30%;">
30%                                                                                       // label on the bar
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="container">
<div class="progress">
<div class="progress-bar progress-bar-striped" style="width:30%;">                        // this progress bar will be stripped
30%                                                                                       
</div>
</div>
</div>

Spinner control in bootstrap
<div class="container">
<div class="spinner-border text-primary">                             // border spinner
<div>
</div>

<div class="spinner-grow text-primary">                               // grow spinner
</div>

how to adjust a spinner in class
<div class="container">
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">
<span class="spinner-border text-warning"></span>
loading....</button>
</div>
</div>

card using bootstrap
card has three parts
header 
body 
footer

<div class="container">
<div class="card" style="width: 30px">
<div class="card-header">header</div>
<img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.V6z_YP_9Uc3yyl9jbpDU8QHaFV?w=260&h=187&c=7&o=5&pid=1.7">
<div class="card-body">
<p class="card-title">bijender singh rawat</p>
<p class="card-text">bijender singh rawat</p>
<a class="card-link" href="https://www.google.com">card link</a>
</div>
<div class="card-footer">footer</div>
</div>
</div>

how to display text over image
<div class="container">
<div class="card" style="width: 400px;">
<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="card-img-top">
<div class="card-img-overlay">
<p class="card-title">card</p>
<p class="card-text">card text</p>
<a class="card-link" href="#">link</a>
</div> 
</div>
</div>
